intro.subtitle: AI Engineer & Researcher
intro.description: I'm a passionate AI engineer with expertise in machine learning, computer vision, and healthcare AI. Currently working on AI agents and medical data classification systems at Secomus Technology while conducting research at HCMUS.

experience.description: Developing AI agent systems and implementing machine learning solutions for production environments. Leading AI research and development initiatives.

experience.location: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science
experience.description: Conducting research in machine learning and healthcare AI. Focus on medical image segmentation and electronic health record (EHR) classification systems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.school: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science (HCMUS)
education.thesis: Disease Classification from Electronic Health Records using Deep Learning
achievements: Specialized in AI and Machine Learning
